name: Improved Rending Fury
text: Honing the deadliness of your claws, you are a living hurricane of rending fury.
prerequisites: Rending Fury, base attack bonus +9, rend special attack.
benefit: Whenever you successfully rend an opponent, you deal an extra 1d6 damage. This damage is not multiplied on a critical hit.
staminaText: As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, the extra damage from this feat is multiplied on a critical hit.
text_zh: 双爪极其致命，你就是疯狂撕扯的活体飓风。
prerequisites_zh: 疯狂撕扯，BAB+9，＜撕扯＞特殊攻击。
benefit_zh: 当你成功发动撕扯，你能造成额外的1d6伤害。此伤害不会因重击而加倍。
staminaText_zh: 只要你在你的耐力池中拥有至少1点耐力，来自这个专长的额外伤害就能在重击时翻倍。
